title: Vibe Tanning Salon fonts
content:
Could I get an id on both of these fonts? I should know the "tanning salon" font but I can't place it. Thanks a ton guys.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100515112537im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vibeheader.jpg)
author: dpiechnik

comments.content:
Any takes on the "vibe" font?

--  
dp
Hmm. I thought 'vibe' might be [Poolhouse](http://web.archive.org/web/20100515112537/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=215&subpage=lettersetter) from House Industries, but it isn't.
